item.title: Central-Continent
Nessaui Lake
item.description: Names Proto-Morellic: Nessaui /nɛs̠ˈs̠ä.wi/ Sarvaran: Lyráwa /lyˈɾá.wa/ Stonechild Imperial: Lïrá /lɪˈrá/ Proto-Morellic: Nesi /ˈnɛ.s̠i/ Sarvaran: Lýra /ˈlý.ɾa/ Stonechild Imperial: Lýr /ˈlýr/

item.title: The -3rd Realm
item.description: Names Proto-Morellic: Lepni Ghuzi Adrani /ˈlɛp.ni ˈgʱu.z̠i ädˈrä.ni/ Sarvaran: Nö́pla Zhýra Edrą́da /ˈnǿ.pla ˈʒý.ɾa eˈdɾã́.da/ Stonechild Imperial: Nḯpla Zhý Ját /ˈnɪ́.

item.title: The 0th Realm
item.description: Names The name of this realm was derived from Basii + Adrani, Basii being from Arabic بَشَر, which came into Proto-Morellic (through contact with 0°e peoples) as Basiar, “human.

item.title: The 2nd Realm
item.description: Names Proto-Morellic: Simi Adrani /ˈs̠i.mi ädˈrä.ni/ Sarvaran: Swý̨ba Eją́da /ˈsʷỹ́.ba eˈd̠͡ʒã́.da/ Stonechild Imperial: Swýp Ját /ˈsʷýp ˈd̠͡ʒát/
